name: Jennifer McLean
what_you_do: Internationally acclaimed healer, author, speaker, and transformational change agent who created the Spontaneous Transformation Technique (STT), a healing system that delivers instant transformation and healing in 7-10 minutes.
who_you_serve: Individuals seeking healing from old hurts and patterns, and entrepreneurs looking to make a difference through doing business-from-the-heart.
social_proof: Appeared on FOX, ABC, and CBS; featured in numerous online summits and publications; over 800 practitioners in training; Healing With The Masters online media franchise reached almost 1,000,000 people over 17 seasons; author of five books; endorsed by Marci Shimoff (NYT bestselling author) and Anita Moorjani (NYT bestselling author).
signature_programs: Spontaneous Transformation Technique (STT), Healing With The Masters, Spontaneous Transformation (course via The Shift Network)
business_focus: Creator of the Spontaneous Transformation Technique healing system and healing-into-success coach supporting entrepreneurs to do business-from-the-heart.
service_provided: Healing sessions, practitioner training, online healing programs, coaching for entrepreneurs, speaking
